mapper.insert: insert into business (bNo, bId, bPw, bNum, bZipCode, bAddress, bdAddress, bPhone, latitude, longitude) values ( null, #{bId}, #{bPw}, #{bNum}, #{bZipCode}, #{bAddress}, #{bdAddress}, #{bPhone}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
mapper.select: select count(*) count from business where bId = #{bId}
select * from business where bId = #{bId} and bPw = #{bPw}

SELECT r.rNo, r.star, b.title, ri.saveName, b.bNo FROM review r JOIN business b ON r.bNo = b.bNo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ri1.rNo, ri1.saveName FROM reviewimg ri1 JOIN ( SELECT rNo, MIN(riNo) AS minRiNo FROM reviewimg GROUP BY rNo ) ri2 ON ri1.rNo = ri2.rNo AND ri1.riNo = ri2.minRiNo ) ri ON r.rNo = ri.rNo ORDER BY r.views DESC

SELECT b.bNo, b.title, b.logo, (3959 * acos(cos(radians(COALESCE(#{lat}, b.latitude))) * cos(radians(b.latitude)) * cos(radians(b.longitude) - radians(COALESCE(#{lan}, b.longitude))) + sin(radians(COALESCE(#{lat}, b.latitude))) * sin(radians(b.latitude)))) AS distance FROM business b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rt.bNo, COUNT(*) as reserved_count FROM reserve r JOIN reserveTime rt ON r.rtNo = rt.rtNo GROUP BY rt.bNo ) r ON b.bNo = r.bNo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bNo, COUNT(*) as reserved_time_count FROM reserveTime WHERE rtDate = COALESCE(#{rsDate}, rtDate) GROUP BY bNo ) rt ON b.bNo = rt.bNo WHERE (r.reserved_count IS NULL OR r.reserved_count < ( SELECT MAX(count_per_bNo) FROM ( SELECT rt.bNo, COUNT(*) as count_per_bNo FROM reserve r JOIN reserveTime rt ON r.rtNo = rt.rtNo GROUP BY rt.bNo ) as subquery ) ) AND (rt.reserved_time_count IS NULL OR rt.reserved_time_count < ( SELECT MAX(count_per_bNo) FROM ( SELECT bNo, COUNT(*) as count_per_bNo FROM reserveTime WHERE rtDate = COALESCE(#{rsDate}, rtDate) GROUP BY bNo ) as subquery ) ) ORDER BY distance ASC

SELECT b.bNo, b.title, b.logo, (3959 * acos(cos(radians(COALESCE(#{lat}, b.latitude))) * cos(radians(b.latitude)) * cos(radians(b.longitude) - radians(COALESCE(#{lan}, b.longitude))) + sin(radians(COALESCE(#{lat}, b.latitude))) * sin(radians(b.latitude)))) AS distance, b.latitude AS lat, b.longitude AS lan FROM business b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bNo, COUNT(*) as reserved_time_count FROM reserveTime GROUP BY bNo ) rt ON b.bNo = rt.bNo ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 10
select bNo, title, logo, bAddress, bdAddress, latitude, longitude from business

SELECT b.title, COUNT(r.rsNo) AS reservationCount FROM business b JOIN reserveTime rt ON b.bNo = rt.bNo JOIN reserve r ON rt.rtNo = r.rtNo WHERE rt.rtDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) GROUP BY b.bNo, b.title ORDER BY reservationCount DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DISTINCT b.title, b.bNo, AVG(r.star) AS star, ri.saveName AS saveName, r.rNo FROM business b INNER JOIN review r ON b.bNo = r.bNo LEFT JOIN reviewimg ri ON r.rNo = ri.rNo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rs.curruntWeight, rs.expectedPrice, COALESCE(rs.surcharge, 0) AS surcharge, d.size, rs.rsNo FROM reserve rs INNER JOIN dog d ON rs.dogNo = d.dogNo ) rs ON r.rsNo = rs.rsNo WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (
b.bAddress LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
)
AND (
rs.curruntWeight BETWEEN 0 AND 2
rs.curruntWeight BETWEEN 2 AND 5
rs.curruntWeight BETWEEN 5 AND 8
rs.curruntWeight BETWEEN 8 AND 10
rs.curruntWeight BETWEEN 10 AND 12
rs.curruntWeight >= 12
)
AND rs.size IN
#{type}
AND (
rs.expectedPrice + rs.surcharge <= 20000
rs.expectedPrice + rs.surcharge <= 40000
rs.expectedPrice + rs.surcharge <= 60000
rs.expectedPrice + rs.surcharge >= 60000
)
GROUP BY r.rNo

SELECT b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate) AS year, WEEK(rt.rtDate) AS week, SUM(r.expectedPrice + IFNULL(r.surcharge, 0)) AS totalPrice FROM reserve r JOIN reserveTime rt ON r.rtNo = rt.rtNo JOIN push p ON r.rsNo = p.rsNo JOIN business b ON rt.bNo = b.bNo WHERE b.bNo = #{bNo} GROUP BY b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate), WEEK(rt.rtDate)

SELECT b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate) AS year, MONTH(rt.rtDate) AS month, SUM(r.expectedPrice + IFNULL(r.surcharge, 0)) AS totalPrice FROM reserve r JOIN reserveTime rt ON r.rtNo = rt.rtNo JOIN push p ON r.rsNo = p.rsNo JOIN business b ON rt.bNo = b.bNo WHERE YEAR(rt.rtDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate), MONTH(rt.rtDate) ORDER BY b.bNo, MONTH(rt.rtDate)

SELECT b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate) AS year, SUM(r.expectedPrice + IFNULL(r.surcharge, 0)) AS totalPrice FROM reserve r JOIN reserveTime rt ON r.rtNo = rt.rtNo JOIN push p ON r.rsNo = p.rsNo JOIN business b ON rt.bNo = b.bNo GROUP BY b.bNo, YEAR(rt.rtDate) ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 4
